data: By Default, Rooms are permanent and can be accessible any time.
We store the chats, playlist, username and settings from the Room but as the service is open to all, we don't store any details about any User.
To Destroy the Rooms, you can do it exclusively from the Room's Setting which will delete all the details including Chats, Username, Playlist from the room and won't be accessible from then.
Lets Binge is an Open to all service and do not store any personal information.
We use services such as Google Analytics to measure usage. These services may set cookies or other information locally on your device.
We use Firebase, which sets sessions on Local Storage
We locally store the Username of the user for future usage.
We locally store the Room Ids for easy access of the user.
The services you use in our room might set some cookies as well.
